#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long x,y;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
        if(x==0 || y==0)
            printf("0\n");
        else
            printf("%lld\n",x/2+y/2+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
